column6: the Srah Chak Administrative Police Force of Daun Penh District Police Inspectorate arrested a suspect at the Kouch Kanong roundabout on Street 70
column10: Phnom Penh. He was charged with aggravated intentional violence (assault with his hand causing injury) which took place at the Kouch Kanong roundabout
column12: 2020 at 1:15 pm.------Suspect’s name is Kim Sara
column20: Phnom Penh.------A white Indian BAJAJ  tricycle with license plate Phnom Penh 1ID-9503 and a black NOKIA mobile phone were seized.------The victim was Touch Chenda
column23: also a tuk tuk driver from Sangkat Teuk Thla
column29: the victim had an argument with the suspect and the suspect hit him 3 or 4 times
column31: and then escaped. ------The victim was treated for his injuries at Sokha Tuol Sangke Hospital until 3:30 pm on the same day
column32: after which he came to report and file a complaint at the Srah Chak Administrative Police Station.------After receiving a complaint from the victim
column33: the Daun Penh District Police Inspector and the Srah Chak Administrative Police Force cooperated with the victim to search for the suspect.------On August 22
column35: the suspect was found at the roundabout at Kouch Kanong
column40: Phnom Penh. He was arrested and handed over to the Srah Chak Administrative Police Station for questioning.------After questioning the suspect
column42: admitted that he had punched the victim.------The suspect was sent to the Daun Penh police station
column43: waiting to be sent to court for legal action. ------POST NEWS
